Introducing URVA Sales: Your Ultimate Sales Force Tracker!

Unlock unparalleled success and maximize your sales team's potential…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing URVA Sales: Your Ultimate Sales Force Tracker!

Unlock unparalleled success and maximize your sales team's potential with URVA Sales, the cutting-edge sales force tracking software designed to revolutionize your approach to customer engagement and team productivity.

Unleash Productivity Beyond Limits

Are you ready to propel your sales team's productivity beyond expectations? URVA Sales is your secret weapon, elevating your team's performance by over 35% through its groundbreaking sales activity automation. With URVA Sales, every interaction is optimized for success.

The Power of Comprehensive Insights

URVA Sales isn't just another CRM – it's beyond. While CRM systems offer data entry, URVA Sales presents you with the truth, the full picture, and the field intelligence you deserve. Say goodbye to fragmented information and regretful reviews. URVA Sales brings transparency through effective management, helping your team thrive.

Innovative Layers of Intelligence

Picture this: URVA Sales is a dynamic layer over your CRM. It captures information intelligence directly from interactions, enhances it with locational accuracy, and closes the loop with real-time communication intelligence. This synergy empowers you with unmatched insights and unparalleled context.

The Ultimate Field Sales Force Tracker

URVA Sales is your strategic partner for unparalleled communication. It listens to geolocation signals, making every meeting check-in and out a learning opportunity. Seamlessly track key sales activities and enhance your team's efficiency with our automagical approach.

Experience a Transformative Journey

Discover the top five features that will redefine your sales strategy:

360° Customer & Lead View: Gain a comprehensive understanding of contacts and interactions, fueling smarter decisions.
Optimized Meeting Management: Elevate meetings with advanced planning tools, geotagging insights, and time tracking.
Efficient Communication & Tracking: Seamlessly track interactions, from click-to-call convenience to valuable feedback collection.
Transparent Performance Management: Monitor goals dynamically, adapt targets on-the-fly, and foster continuous self-improvement.
AI-driven Insights & Recommendations: Boost performance with AI-driven recommendations, optimizing customer engagement.
Trusted by the Best

Join the ranks of our satisfied customers who have experienced unprecedented success with URVA Sales:

"URVA solved all 4 of our problems, with 1 app." - Manager
"We got complete visibility of our sales vertical with URVA." - Head (Field Sales Team)
Unveil the Future of Sales with URVA Sales

Experience the comprehensive features that drive success, including task management, route planning, call logs, product catalog management, and much more. Elevate your sales journey with AI nudges, process automation, and leadership insights.

Your Journey to Triumph Begins Now

Are you ready to supercharge your sales team? Crush targets, transform strategies, and embrace a tool that guarantees team transformation. Unleash the full potential of your team today with URVA Sales – your ultimate sales force tracker.
